text: "Treehouse of Horror XIV" is the first episode of The Simpsonss 15th season. It was first broadcast on the Fox network on November 2, 2003. It is the 14th episode of the Treehouse of Horror series. The episode was written by John Swartzwelder. Steven Dean Moore is the director of the episode. Jerry Lewis, Dudley Herschbach, Jennifer Garner, and Oscar De La Hoya are guest stars in the episode. The episode has three stories: "Reaper Madness", "Frinkenstein", and "Stop the World, I Want to Goof Off". In the first story, Homer Simpson becomes the Grim Reaper. In the second story, Professor Frink makes his dead father look like Frankenstein's monster. In the third story, Bart and Milhouse stop time using a watch. About 16.22 million people watched the episode when it was first broadcast. "Treehouse of Horror XIV" was nominated for an Emmy Award in 2004. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:The Simpsons (season 15) episodes Category:Treehouse of Horror Category:2003 television episodes
title: Treehouse of Horror XIV
